title: So i decided to go on my other smurf and all i see is people instalocking
body:
Like, why people feel entitled to a role is beyond me, first game i call top and pick my champ, then this prick instalocks Tryn and says top, i was like fine ill just go bot with Rengar and of cause that didn't turn out well since he ended up feeding, then i queue up 6 minutes later so i don't get him again but surprise surprise hes there, same thing happens except this time i called mid and had locked in Zed, 15 seconds later he says mid and picks Tryn.

Now honestly i don't care its a damn smurf ill just dodge and go on another account which i did, but this is a huge problem for new players, no wonder its so hard leveling up with all the toxic smurfs, no runes and masteries, ridiculous matchmaking like having 9 low level 10-20's and one ranked guy, great matchmaking, honestly something needs to be done for new players cause this is just unfair for them.

TL;DR lvling up for new players sucks, toxic smurfs and toxic new players that don't understand the rules nor do they understand the consequences of there actions, no masteries, no runes, its a mess.

Or become a bigger troll than he is while giving no 2 shat about him so he will wither by himself at the corner in shame.

That is correct, it is only recommended to do so if you are confident that you CAN carry the game 100% of the times while doing this.

Otherwise one can only stick with reporting and ignoring aye.

I think it does, since there are still people complaining about being wrongly chat restricted, banned and what not.

But I think the processing rate is just incredibly slow and Riot really ought to improve on that.

Nah, as a new player you are actually matched up with new players. It all depends on which setting you choose when you create the account. If you pick 'beginner' you will be matched with other beginners of the same level (occasionally you do play against a smurf being a ♥♥♥♥ with a mejais stomping the noobs like beginner bots, but not that often. If you pick 'veteran', that is where you get these toxic smurfs, feeding and generally being ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥. It's also where you get the messed up matchmaking because it assumes knowledge of the game (ignoring lack of runes and masteries). If you pick 'expert' then you get even more smurfs, every game is like a normal game but without runes and masteries because everybody knows what they are doing. Matchmaking here is even stranger because you can be level 17 and get matched up with gold+ in norms. 

BTW, with those games... you got trolled by tryn ♥
if your "smurfing" it doesn't matter...just go top steal trynd cs and solo carry anyway
The lack of exp is a pain tho especially when there's other smurfs as well, and i wouldn't want a new player going 1v2 bot lane, that's just not fair for them.
so....1 person? your issue is one person picks tryn in the role you called...maybe stop calling and just pick when all the trolls are done.
Maybe, and this is just a thought, i was using an example? Maybe you should think a bit mate, little common sense will go a long way.

"this guy did something that no one else i the game did so its 1/10"
"same guy 5 mins later, did it again, so its 1/20"

ok, now sample a few more games...same person didnt show up and no issues. ok, so say 3 games of no trolls. thats 1/50. the more games you sample the smaller that number gets. and the more obvious its not an issue, its 1 person, or a FEW people. who troll and always troll. and your example and complaint was about 1 person. not about a large number of low level trolls.

you need to grow a brain, not me. common sense dictates that seeing 1/20 trolls is a low number and isnt something to throw a tantrum over saying "oh no OCE low level trolls are causing new players to quit LOL!"
